content: if you love modern crochet baby blanket patterns you will love the piper blanket using an easy construction method this crochet baby blanket boasts v shaped stripes and v shaped cables for a modern look use any colors you prefer to make it special for any new babe with a mitered square construction the blanket has lovely v shaped striping with simple cables that grow in number as we add row we create a radiating lines in an inverse v shape that cut through the stripes but feel organic and cozy ★skill level advanced/medium beginner to intermediate - this is a written crochet pattern you should know how to read crochet patterns before purchasing this baby blanket pattern uses stitches and techniques that most advanced beginner crocheters should be comfortable with you should know how to chain single_crochet double_crochet and be familiar with front and back post stitches specifically we use back post double crochets and front post treble crochets the front post treble crochets are crossed in this modern crochet baby blanket pattern to create the cables as long as you know how to work a front post treble you should be able to work them crossed this pattern includes picture tutorials for the following stitches back post double_crochet front post treble_crochet and crossed front post treble_crochet it also includes a step-by-step photo tutorial of the crochet baby blanket pattern for several row to help you feel confident ★pattern includes 1 a full pdf version with written pattern and photo tutorials for special stitches and step-by-step for row 1 through 9 please note there is no video tutorial for this pattern 2 a printer friendly version with just the written pattern to save ink ★terms used us standard pattern is written in english ★size approximately 33 inches x 33 inches after blocking the size is easy to customize ★materials required for this modern baby blanket crochet pattern you will need cotton dk light-3 yarn of your choice in 2 colors color a 270 grams / 9 5 ounces / 626 yards color b 200 grams / 7 ounces / 464 yards yarn used lion brand s coboo in colorways white and mauve you can use a different weight of yarn one color or many colors if you prefer please keep in mind if you change the yarn weight your yarn usage will differ this crochet baby blanket pattern is written to dk weight only ★tools 4 mm g-6 tapestry needle scissors stitch markers if you prefer them make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you love the piper baby blanket pattern as much as i do enjoy happy crocheting the loophole fox
